ai-ide-module.check-level-tooltip: 语法检查的深度级别。1表示仅拼写和基本语法规则 2包括更高级的语法和语法 3包括样式建议和最高级别/正式语法模式。默认值 3
ai-ide-module.check-mode-tooltip: 检查期间引擎的模式。选项为 FULL_CHECK QUICK_CHECK SPELL_CHECK 和 ADVANCED_SPELL。默认值 FULL_CHECK
ai-ide-module.info: 启用此设置会立即生效。如果仍在进行开发，请避免启用它，以防止某些功能的潜在故障。

assets-module.info: 资产 包括音频和图像 用于创建CSV文件进行批量上传。用户可以复制资产ID或URL并在课程开发批量上传的CSV中使用。首先 在这里添加所有必需的资产 然后使用资产ID或URL准备CSV文件，最后上传CSV进行批量处理。

attendance-module.add-time-for-live-class: 为直播课添加时间（分钟）
attendance-module.add-time-for-live-class-info: 如果您认为显示的时间不正确，或者因忘记停止计时器而超时，您可以在此处编辑时间。
attendance-module.attendance-operate-info: 出勤跟踪期间计时器如何操作？
attendance-module.info-title: 出勤系统中计时器规则列表：

attendance-tooltip: Attendance is calculated by dividing the number of verified attendance days by the total number of expected attendance days.

badge-reward.can-be-received: Vibes can be received when a teacher or a student sends you vibes.
badge-reward.can-be-sent-from-chat: Vibes can be sent from chat.
badge-reward.can-be-sent-from-student-lab: Vibes can be sent from student lab.
badge-reward.points-can-be-received-by-completing-the: Points can be received by completing the lessons
badge-reward.step-chat-1: In the chat, click on the smileys icon.
badge-reward.step-chat-2: Then, click on the vibes icon to view the available vibes.
badge-reward.step-chat-3: Click on any vibes you would like to send.
badge-reward.step-student-lab-1: In the student lab, click on the name of the student whom you want to send vibes.
badge-reward.step-student-lab-2: A box will appear with available vibes. Click on any vibes that you would like to send to the particular person.
badge-reward.student-lab: In student lab, vibes can only be sent to the students who have scored the highest points (highest point gainer) or have completed the lesson first (first lesson achiever) or have completed the most lessons in the class (most lesson achiever).
badge-reward.to-know: to know more about the badges and how to receive them.
badge-reward.ways: Badges can be received in various ways.

calendar-module.bulk-update-info: Verify the dates before updating in bulk. Easily modify both the start and end dates. Remember to click 'Update' for the changes to take effect.
calendar-module.duration-info: You have the flexibility to update the duration for either a single lesson or multiple lessons in bulk
calendar-module.start-date-info: Adjusting the start date will automatically recalculate the end date while maintaining the original duration

calibration-module.info: 请为老师授予校准功能的许可。只有选定的老师才能在他们的帐户中访问校准菜单。

camera-permission-module.allow-text: This will enable you to participate in video calls and benefit from the Attention System in the student lab.
camera-permission-module.allow-text-2: Our site requires your camera permission for Video call and also use of the Attention System in student lab.
camera-permission-module.block-text: Our site won't work if you block them. For example, you won't be able to join a video call.

chrome.allow-text: Our site requires your camera permission for video calls and utilizes an Attention System in the student lab. By granting us camera access, you enable us to make full use of these features.
chrome.block-text: Our site won't work if you block them. For example, you won't be able to join a video call.
chrome.note: To give permission for our site to access your camera, you may need to change a Chrome setting. Click on the padlock icon or the "Site permissions" icon and make sure that Camera is set to Allow like in the picture below.

camera-permission-module.dont-allow-text: Opting for this will result in blocking camera permission for our site. However, it's important to note that this will limit your ability to fully utilize the features of our platform. For instance, you will not be able to join video calls.

edge.allow-text: This will enable you to participate in video calls and benefit from the Attention System in the student lab.
edge.block-text: Opting for this will result in blocking camera permission for our site. However, it's important to note that this will limit your ability to fully utilize the features of our platform. For instance, you will not be able to join video calls.
edge.note: To give permission for our site to access your camera, you may need to change a Microsoft Edge setting. Click on the padlock icon or the "Site permissions" icon and make sure that your camera is set to Allow like in the picture below.

firefox.allow-text: Our site requires your camera permission for Video call and to also use the Attention System in the student lab.
firefox.block-text: Our site won't work if you block it. For example, you won't be able to join a video call.
firefox.note: Don't forget to check Remember this Decision to not see this message again.
firefox.note-2: If you don't see this prompt, you may need to change a Firefox setting. In the address bar, type and press Enter. Under Permissions, make sure that Camera is set to Allow

camera-permission-module.never-for-website-text: Choosing this option will permanently block camera permission for our site. We recommend avoiding this option unless you have specific privacy concerns.
camera-permission-module.never-message: "Never show again" will disable camera permission and prevent this popup from appearing again. If you would like to enable this feature in the future, you can go to your General Settings.

safari.allow-text: This will enable you to participate in video calls and benefit from the Attention System in the student lab.
safari.dont-allow-text: Opting for this will result in blocking camera permission for our site. However, it's important to note that this will limit your ability to fully utilize the features of our platform. For instance, you will not be able to join video calls.
safari.never-for-website-text: Choosing this option will permanently block camera permission for our site. We recommend avoiding this option unless you have specific privacy concerns.
safari.note: To give permission for our site to access your camera, you may need to change a Safari setting. Under Safari Setting, make sure that Camera is set to Allow like in the picture below.

camera-permission-module.title: Notice for Camera Permission
camera-permission-module.when-choose: When prompted, choose Allow or Block.

setting-module.activity-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Avtivity Report under Study Skills report.
setting-module.ai: 启用AI将在学生实验室中辅导机器人 并在学生提交答案后立即生成AI报告作为反馈。
setting-module.ai-on-feedback: 启用此功能将使学生能够在开放式课程活动中收到AI生成的反馈。此反馈将提供有价值的见解 学生将能够在提供的反馈中看到他们的结果
setting-module.ai-on-speech: 启用此功能将使学生能够在语音课程中收到AI生成的反馈。此反馈将提供有价值的见解 学生将能够在提供的反馈中看到他们的结果
setting-module.allow-completing-round-afterward: Allow for later completion for the round.
setting-module.attendance-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Attendance Report under Study Skills report.
setting-module.attention-system: 启用关注功能将允许系统跟踪用户的注意力、击键和鼠标移动。
setting-module.attention-system-off: 从学校级别关闭关注系统
setting-module.auto-play-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over auto-play options
setting-module.avatar: 启用头像功能将允许您使用卡通头像动画。
setting-module.badge-bar: Disabling this will hide the Badge Bar for Teachers and Students.
setting-module.bagde: 启用此功能将隐藏课堂内的徽章。
setting-module.camera-permission: 某些系统功能需要相机访问权限。您可以在此启用或禁用相机权限。禁用它意味着无法访问关注跟踪，尤其是对学校而言非常重要。
setting-module.chat-icon-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Chat Icon
setting-module.chat-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Chat Report under Social Skills report
setting-module.class-test-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Class Test Report
setting-module.code-standards: Disabling this will hide Codes and Standards inside the classroom.
setting-module.complete-round: By incorporating this addition, it enables the completion of the lesson after a limited number of rounds.
setting-module.copy-paste: 在问题说明中启用/禁用复制/粘贴功能
setting-module.copy-paste-info: 为防止学生将问题说明中的单词复制粘贴到答案输入字段中，您可以启用此设置。
setting-module.create-class-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Create Class option in student
setting-module.current-game-setting-info: COUNT_PLAY和RATIO是两种游戏交付类型。比率游戏是在课程练习中循环进行的 基于问题总数和通过比例 而计数游戏是根据用户解决的问题数量进行的。
setting-module.current-progress: 启用此功能将在课堂内隐藏当前进度条。
setting-module.ebook-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide E-Book
setting-module.email-notification: 请检查是否希望在您的电子邮件上接收通知。
setting-module.engagement-menu: Disabling this will hide the Engagement Menu inside the classroom.
setting-module.font: 您可以自定义学生实验室中的作业和笔记字体，更改将立即生效。
setting-module.full-course-progress: 启用此功能将在课堂内隐藏完整的课程进度条。
setting-module.game: 启用游戏功能将允许用户在本学校的所有课程中玩游戏。
setting-module.game-off: 从学校级别关闭游戏设置
setting-module.game-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Game report
setting-module.help-video: Disabling this will hide the Help Video Button for Teachers and Students.
setting-module.help-video-pop-up: Disabling this will hide the Help Video pop-up inside the classroom.
setting-module.high-score: Disabling this will hide the High Score inside the student lab.
setting-module.language-level: 启用此功能将隐藏课堂内的语言水平。
setting-module.language-skills-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Language Skills Report under Language Skills report.
setting-module.language-translation-info: 用户可以在学生实验室中将英语翻译成其他语言。要禁用语言翻译，并专注于英语，您可以停用它，这将防止学生将其翻译成其他语言。
setting-module.large-font-size: 启用此功能将增加学生实验室中文本的字体大小。
setting-module.learning-coach: 启用此功能将在学生实验室中显示学习教练
setting-module.lesson-completion-rate-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Lesson Completion Rate under Academic Skills report.
setting-module.live-class-max-time-limit: 为了防止实时课堂意外计时器超时，您可以设置默认的最大持续时间。如果教师忘记停止计时器，此限制将有助于确保平稳的会话。
setting-module.make-request: Disabling this will hide Make Request inside the classroom.
setting-module.note: Disabling this will hide Notes inside the classroom.
setting-module.note-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Note Report under Social Skills report.
setting-module.pdf-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide PDF
setting-module.point: 启用此功能将隐藏课堂内的积分。
setting-module.problem-solving-skills-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Problem Solving Skills under Academic Skills report.
setting-module.proficiency-on-lessons-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Proficiency On Lessons under Academic Skills report.
setting-module.progress-bar: Disabling this will hide the Progress Bar in the student lab.
setting-module.push-notification: 请检查是否希望在您的手机上接收通知。
setting-module.report-buttons: Disabling this will hide Report buttons inside the student card.
setting-module.role-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Role Report under Social Skills report
setting-module.rti: Disabling this will hide the Real Time Indicators inside the student lab.
setting-module.schedule-report-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide Schedule Report under Study Skills report.
setting-module.school-daily-time: 学校每日时间（以小时为单位）代表学生在我们系统中为他们的作业分配的预期每日学习时间。此值用于计算报告中跟踪小时数的百分比。
setting-module.show-number-of-student-desc: By Selecting this, shool will have control over to show or hide number of student in classroom
setting-module.single-double-course-completion: This will show the Course Completion bar in Single or Double bar inside the classroom.
setting-module.skill-chart: 启用此功能将在课堂内隐藏不同的技能图表。
setting-module.skip-problem: Enabling this will allow students to skip a problem.
setting-module.speech-server-check: Enabling this feature enhances the conversion of speech audio from the server, improving its quality and compatibility with the receiving system. This ensures a smoother and more efficient processing experience, enabling seamless integration of speech data into various applications or workflows.
setting-module.speech-tries: 跟踪和显示语音问题的尝试次数
setting-module.speech-writing-conversion: 将语音问题转换为书面问题
setting-module.speech-writing-conversion-info: 当学生的麦克风不起作用时，允许学生将语音问题转换为书面问题，您可以启用此设置。
setting-module.streak-persistence: Disabling this will hide Streak and Persistence inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-dashboard-info: By Selecting this, schools will have control over the Student Dashboard as a Simple Landing Page or as Classroom Lists.
setting-module.student-diary: Disabling this will hide Student Diaries inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-individual-report: Disabling this will hide Student Notes inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-lab: Disabling different fields in the student lab
setting-module.student-note: Disabling this will hide Student Notes inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-rubrics: Disabling this will hide Student Rubrics inside the classroom.
setting-module.student-title-info: 启用此功能将隐藏其他学生的卡片，确保授权的学生只能在课堂内查看自己的信息。
setting-module.weekly-time-limit-for-game: 这是游戏的每周时间限制。超过此限制将暂时限制访问游戏。这有助于促进学习和娱乐之间的健康平衡。
